entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 this morning. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Thursday 29 December 2022
